description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Billy's Job is an arcade  game. Your task is to store all the object in the room.For this, push  them on the conveyor bell.When all is done take the key to next levels.
